casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby JOHNSON 57PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2017 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Johnson, Bobby. Alvin William Keller, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of June 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of June 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 26th day of June 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
